name: places/ChIJl_ZUXS5ZwokRfWtTWYb8DQk
formattedAddress: 524 E 5th St, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 524 E 5th St, New York, NY 10009-6523, USA

originalText.text:
Before I met Nacar, I was super frustrated with my hair, though I couldn't pinpoint exactly why. It just wasn't working.

Enter Nacar – who I describe to friends as “my hair doctor" :) She evaluated my hair with such thoughtfulness and precision, and the transformation since starting to work with her has been amazing. I leave every appointment obsessed with my cut/highlights and my hair's become exponentially healthier since my first appointment.

I totally trust Nacar and have literally told her multiple times “do whatever you think is right – I’m game” … and she’s never led me astray!  She's the best.

Enter Nacar – who I describe to friends as “my hair doctor" :) She evaluated my hair with such thoughtfulness and precision, and the transformation since starting to work with her has been amazing. I leave every appointment obsessed with my cut/highlights and my hair's become exponentially healthier since my first appointment.

I totally trust Nacar and have literally told her multiple times “do whatever you think is right – I’m game” … and she’s never led me astray!  She's the best.

originalText.text: I'm leaving a review for the second time because that's how amazing Nacar is! When you go to her, you'll not just come out your most beautiful and confident self, you'll also feel so happy and light just talking to her. Every time I've gone to her with an inspiration picture, she has adapted it perfectly to my hair type, and recommended the best products. The tricks she gives to style your hair are so helpful. I've been recommending the Studio NR to all my friends and I'll continue doing so! My favourite place in the city to get my hair done!

originalText.text: I’ve been doing my hair with Nacar for years. From blonde to brunette she always makes my color look so natural. This picture was from birthday when she styled it as well. Always perfect!

text.text: I’ve been doing my hair with Nacar for years. From blonde to brunette she always makes my color look so natural. This picture was from birthday when she styled it as well. Always perfect!

originalText.text: Nacar at NR Studio is such a gem. She gives a great men’s haircut and really knows how to give a great cut and considers one’s hair texture and growth patterns. She never oversells you on anything too, but gives great product recommendations when asked to help my scalp when irritated. A really professional attitude and result.

text.text: Nacar at NR Studio is such a gem. She gives a great men’s haircut and really knows how to give a great cut and considers one’s hair texture and growth patterns. She never oversells you on anything too, but gives great product recommendations when asked to help my scalp when irritated. A really professional attitude and result.

originalText.text: Nacar is the best!! Her studio is beautiful and always has the best atmosphere for either working during a treatment or a fun afternoon. I used to travel out of state to get my hair done until I found her! She does an amazing job with my blonde highlights and focuses on the health of my hair. She gave me a smoothing keratin treatment after listening to my struggle with some frizz. Being blonde I was nervous but it looks so good and feels amazing!
